name: Cargo Truck Driver 18: Truck Simulator Game
name_original: Cargo Truck Driver 18: Truck Simulator Game
description:
Get ready for the amazing Heavy Machine Transporter: Truck Simulator. This big Euro truck driver game is a new sensational simulator for truck driving games lovers. Test you heavy cargo truck driving skills and transport heavy machinery like excavator, cars, ships, tractors and much more. Enjoy the best 3D truck simulation game in realistic city environment. Fulfill your driving passion with this American truck driver game. Good driving experience helps you to reach in time to the destination. Driving trucks loaded with heavy machines is not an easy job. Prove your Euro truck driving skills and transport cargo from one point to the destination point.

Drive through the offroad tracks and curvy road in stunning and realistic city environment. But this is not so simple like car driving games or other driving simulators. This truck game is just like car games that you enjoy the fun of car driving games. So Drive your Cargo lorry carefully on curve turns and avoids accidents. This is the best cargo truck transport game of all time. You have already played offroad truck driving games but this truck driving simulation is very challenging one for you. Heavy truck games are very interesting cargo simulator games for truck drivers. Enjoy the USA trucks drive and transport cargo to the destination.

Heavy Machine Transporter: Truck Simulator game features:
* Stunning Graphics and realistic environment for cargo truck driving
* Smooth and effective controls of truck simulation game
* 12 challenging levels of truck transport
* All missions of new cargo truck transport have limited time
* Variety of Euro and American Trucks for cargo
* Loading, unloading and parking missions

In Heavy Machine Transporter: Truck Simulator game you are transporting heavy machinery like excavators, containers, huge boats or other factory luggage. So use your car driving experience to become a real cargo truck driver 18. US Truck driving games are very popular in every age group. Truck driver games are variety of driving missions to transport cargo. Try the passionate and sensational driver of heavy cargo truck simulator on offroad tracks and highways. 

Download Heavy Machine Transporter: Truck Simulator game now and enjoy fantastic driving simulation on your phones. Rate it and give your feedback about game play.
